parameters: integer codes changed to text enum
changelog.comment: Update to azimuth processing method flag

flag_avoid_zeros_in_multilooking_cnf.description: Flag that indicates if the samples set to zero in the beams will be avoided when averaging in multi-looking: No (false); Yes (true)

flag_azimuth_windowing_method_cnf.comment: this is a parameter with value options
flag_azimuth_windowing_method_cnf.description: Flag the sets the azimuth windowing method: Disabled ('none'); Boxcar ('boxcar'); Hamming ('hamming'); Hanning ('hanning')

azimuth_window_width_cnf.comment: this is a parameter with value range
azimuth_window_width_cnf.description: Width of Azimuth window (minimum value: 32, maximum value: 64)

N_looks_stack_cnf.comment: this is a parameter with a value dependency to other parameter

flag_antenna_weighting_cnf.comment: this is a parameter with multiple dependencies to other parameter(s)
flag_antenna_weighting_cnf.description: Flag that activates the antenna weighting: Deactivated (false); Activated (true)
